text:
Does anyone know if any progress is being made in relation to cutting down on html bloat from HS wrappers?

This post received not much else than silence (as per usual) :disappointed: Iâ€™ve raised concern with this and quite a few other things with our AM some time ago too, but no update from her either.

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/HTML-bloat-any-roadmap/td-p/675565>

Reminder: If you had a magic wand and could have any feature in HubSpot what would it be? Post your idea to the idea forum, then link to it from here so folks can help upvote your idea. Upvotes help HubSpotters quantify demand for functionality and influence our prioritization.
